name: Space Rocks (itch) (Gorbles Games)
description:
Instructions:

Score 1,000 points to win.

UP: Move

Left/Right: Change Direction

SPACE: Shoot

This game was made following a tutorial from yoyo games. I'm uploading as a practice game this way when I upload my own game I know how to do it correctly. Please let me know your thoughts and look out for other games in the future.
